name: Health-First Hannah
title: Chief Wellness Officer
backstory: Former burnout victim who spent a fortune on medical bills before discovering preventive health. Now prioritizes health spending above all else. Believes health is the ultimate wealth.

petPeeves: skipping on health to save money
catchphrases: You can't enjoy money from a hospital bed
The best ROI is on your health
biases: willing to pay premium for organic/quality
skeptical of things that harm health

voiceDescription: Warm and wellness-focused. Evaluates everything through health lens. Speaks about longevity, energy, stress, and quality of life.
decisionFramework: Will this improve health or harm it? Does this reduce stress? Is this an investment in longevity? What's the health ROI?
